title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
description: The title of the hyperlink builder is not consistent with the expected behavior.
OB: When setting a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com', the title of the hyperlink builder changes according to the current settings.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the settings or content of the hyperlink.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Observe the title of the hyperlink builder and note that it changes based on the current settings.
